category.name: PSM
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: PS_convert_legacy_transform_to_plmxml
preference.preference_description: Allows Teamcenter to display legacy transforms in a PLM XML format. This preference is only effective if a legacy transform exists and no PLM XML transform is assigned.This preference can be set using the preference name as an environment variable. Valid Values: true - Teamcenter tries to convert the legacy transform to PLM XML format for display purposes only. false - Teamcenter displays the legacy transform as is.
